word: NOW WITH SO MUCH PRELIMINARY, I WILL BEGIN. AND I WILL BEGIN AWAY BACK, JULY 27, 1897. THAT IS SINCE THE LAST GENERAL CONFERENCE. I WANT TO BRING THE MATTER BY THE TESTIMONIES RIGHT UP TO THE PRESENT DATE, SO THAT YOU WILL SEE THAT THE LORD HIMSELF SAYS THAT WHAT SHOULD HAVE BEEN DONE HAS NOT BEEN DONE, RATHER THAN THAT I SHOULD SAY IT; AND SO THAT YOU MAY SEE THAT WHAT I AM TELLING HERE THIS AFTERNOON IS PRESENT TRUTH. HERE IS WHAT HE SAID JULY 27, 1897:--
